doc:
June Marlowe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/June_Marlowe 0 June Marlowe (born Gisela Valaria Goetten, November 6, 1903 – March 10, 1984) was an American film actress who began her career during the silent film era. She was best known for her performance of "Miss Crabtree" in the Our Gang shorts. June_Marlowe ( born Gisela_Valaria_Goetten , November_6_,_1903 – March_10_,_1984 ) was an_American_film_actress who began her_career during the_silent_film_era . She was_best_known for her_performance of "_Miss_Crabtree " in the_Our_Gang_shorts .
